channel.title: Make Windows XP Look Shiney
channel.description: Recently I was looking at some screenshots from my good friend Clark Sell and  I spent more time admiring the theme on his copy of Windows than looking at the error he was trying to show me. Anyway, the theme is...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Ben+00:00
item.description:
I was actually going to download that theme, but Micro$soft in typical form, require me to perform a "Windows Genuine Advantage plug-in installation", provide DNA samples for 6 generations of my family, renounce the devil and send them a signed photograph of Anthea Turner before I can!
Can you just mail me it? (^_^)
item.dc:creator: Ben
